column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: On------ the morning of October 25
column5: three construction workers were sent to hospital after being poisoned from eating a puffer-fish near Prek Treeng Stung Hav district. They are now receiving emergency treatment. The men had come from other provinces to work
column6: and may not have known the dangers of the highly toxic fish.------Police have called for people to be cautious when eating sea fish as this species may cause a fatal heart attack and death if medical assistance isn’t found quickly.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/381721
